fears.title: Admission feels complicated? That's okay.
fears.subtitle: We answer the most common questions and fears.
fears.fear1_answer: We are a licensed agency. We work only under an official contract that clearly states all our obligations, so your admission is legally protected. Plus, we have 500+ reviews from real students.
fears.fear2_answer: You don't have to know Turkish from day one. We will find a university where the program is fully in English. Our team speaks both Russian and Turkish – we will be your "translator" at every stage, from documents to arrival.
fears.fear3_title: That I won't make it in time
fears.fear3_answer: This is our job. You will have a personal manager who creates a custom admission timeline. We track all dates, prepare documents and submit them for you, so you don't miss anything.
fears.fear4_answer: It's more affordable than you think. First, our service fees are fully transparent. Second (and most important), we know how to find scholarships and grants that can cover up to 80% of your tuition.
fears.fear5_answer: Our success rate is 98%. The secret is simple: we apply to several universities at once (including "safe" options) and know how to assemble the "ideal" application package. We guarantee admission in the contract.
fears.fear6_answer: You won't be alone. Our work doesn't end after enrollment. We help with adaptation, housing and, most importantly, add you to a closed chat of our students who are already in Turkey – you'll find friends right away.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most popular questions about admission
faq.question1: How much do your services cost?
faq.answer1: The cost depends on the selected service package. Basic package from $500, full support from $1200. We provide installments.
faq.question2: What documents are needed for admission?
faq.answer2: Main documents: certificate/diploma with translation, passport, photos, motivation letter. Full list depends on the chosen university.
faq.question3: Can I apply without knowing Turkish?
faq.answer3: Yes, many universities offer programs in English. There are also preparatory language courses.
faq.answer4: The process takes 2 to 6 months depending on the university and application timing.
faq.answer5: We guarantee admission to one of the selected universities if all requirements are met, or we return the money.
faq.question6: Do you help with housing in Turkey?
faq.answer6: Yes, we help with finding and booking accommodation: dormitories, apartment rentals, host families.
